alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 4:58PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jefferson and southwestern Madison Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 457 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Monticello, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Greenville, Casa Blanco, Lamont, Waukeenah, Aucilla, Capps, Eridu, Nash and Drifton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
